alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:46PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Dona Ana County through 315 PM MDT... At 245 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Northrup Landing to 9 miles northeast of Jornada Range. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portions of Jornada Experimental Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County
